评论详情: Let me start this review by saying the dress itself is super cute and fits great! However, I was disappointed by the fact that I received a used dress instead of a new one. At a price point of almost $60, I would expect to receive a new dress as advertised. Not only is there a hole in the pocket but there was a “Sweet Baby Ray’s” napkin left in said pocket by whoever wore it last. :-/ I would rate the dress itself 5 stars but the overall experience a 3.
Loved this dress! Get lots of compliments on it and perfect for photos!
buy it, that’s all i gotta say

Perfect baby shower dress! The arm bands are kind uncomfortable but only after wearing all day. I’m 5’2 and wore a medium at 8months pregnant. I feel like a Large could have worked but I didn’t want to risk it being too big in the chest and shoulders.

The dress itself was cute and a good dupe for the Free People dress. However, it looked frumpy on me. Something just didn't lay quite right. The fabric was okay, some threads here and there. I returned it right away so I didn't see how it would hold up with washing. Just not for me.

It’s super comfortable. I can wear it off the shoulder or on the shoulder and it looks cute either way. It’s just thick enough so it isn’t see through and it’s really soft! Also has pockets, love a good pocket.

评论概述: Not the best fit for a midsize girlie
评论详情: This arrive at a good time. I thought a XL it would fit well from reading the reviews but it was way too tight and the string was coming off from the flowers. It’s cute just wish the sizes went up to XXl and 3x
This dress is beautiful! I love it and have received many compliments. My only complaint is that the fabric has started to come undone after just one wash. Treating it very carefully.
Obsessed with this dress. I wore it for family pictures and loved! I am 5‘5 and 125 pounds and I ordered the size small. Fits perfect and great quality.
It fit true to size and the color is really pretty
good, thick material, comes with pockets, nice embroidery, and a flattering fit, my only complaint is that it’s a bit of a brighter magenta than what is pictured.

Absolutely loved this dress, true to size and super comfortable. Very flattering all the way around, whether you want to hide your arms or draw attention away from your stomach. Perfect length for tall ladies and the fabric is very light.

I have been eyeing this dress for a while now and so I'm glad I finally bought it. The chartreuse color is so pretty with the blue details. This dress gives all the FP vibes without the hefty price tag. I'm 5'7 and wearing the small.

I love this dress! I bought my usual Medium size but was still able to wear this for my baby shower at 34 weeks pregnant! It is fitted but stretchy up top, flowy from the bust down. The fabric and the stitched flowers really make this feel high quality
I absolutely love this dress. I wore it for my daughter’s newborn photos and it was perfect. I’d say it true to size, but also postpartum body friendly.
The sleeves aren't as long as the pic shows but the fit and quality are great. Want to order more colors for sure!

Ordered this for family photos in dark red but it was much brighter than expected so I ordered the brown since I had seen it on instagram. See photo for colors-dark red was bright red with hot pink embroidered flowers, dark brown is a warm brown with dark flowers. Normally an X-Large but large fit great.

Looks just like photo, but mine arrived with some threading loose around top part and some white marks on the sleeves. Other than that this is really pretty! It’s slightly heavy, great length for what I wanted.

Bought this dress for family photos and can’t tell you how many compliments I got on it looking so lux. Has pockets, comfy, breathable & lightweight. I went with my normal size just so it wasn’t too loose, the only thing o wasn’t in love with, is that the sleeves weren’t full length but definitely not a deal breaker for me.

评论概述: LOVE THIS DRESS! My new fave!!!
评论详情: I get soooooo many compliments on this dress. I got it in the “dark brown” color but it definitely has more of a dusty red/burgundy feel to it, which I love. It works so well for maternity but I also look forward to wearing it next fall without a bump! Just buy it! It’s one of those Amazon rare finds that’s actually super flattering 😍 (for reference: I got it in a S, I’m 5’5”, 130ish lbs pregnant/115lbs not pregnant)

评论概述: Beautiful! But wish it was looser
评论详情: I usually wear an xl or size 14. I love this dress, but I would be comfortable in an xl, this one is a L. Length is perfect. Material is great. Good amount of stretch in the bust. For height/ length reference I’m 5’1.

I received the dress in hopes it would be what was pictured: a thick gauze-like material dress with embroidered flowers and in a darker red color. Instead I received a bright red dress, similar style, but with embroidered circles all over it, almost like poka-dots, and a drawstring waste/bow in the front. I did not even waste my time trying this dress on. Definitely disappointed and frustrated with what I received for the price I paid!

I have looked at this style from FP, but just couldn’t afford. This is a great dupe. It fit well. Material is likely thinner, but the savings made it worth it. The only difference I’ve seen, is the FP dress has larger puffy  sleeves.

I bought this dress for a wedding and ended up loving it! The fit is very flattering and the material is good. Even though I have a larger cup size, I was still able to wear it with the sleeves down and had no issues. I would recommend this dress to anyone!
Would have loved the dress BUT dress came to me used. Which is gross.

评论概述: Close up of this pretty dress
评论详情: Such a pretty dress! Great quality!

This dress was absolutely perfect for our fall family photo shoot. I got so many compliments during the photo shoot! Great thick material and is not see through! Recommend to hang dry after washing as it did shrink a little after I accidentally put in the dryer.
Beautiful colors and style. True to size. I love it!

This dress is incredible! I ordered it as an option for my baby shower and I am so grateful I did! It’s comfy, great fabric, and not to mention everytime I wear it I get all of the compliments. It’s non maternity but will stretch with a baby bump which is perfect because that means it’s a dress you can wear anytime! I couldn’t recommend this dress more! Flattering!
The pattern is pretty but mine came and one sleeve had elastic around the shoulder so it could be worn on the shoulder but the other sleeve had no elastic so could only be worn off the shoulder

I had the hardest time finding a dress for my baby shower. I got so many compliments on this dress and I'm so glad i bought it! Its not see through at all, flattering for the bump, and the fabric is soft. The neck line is pretty and not too low. The stitching is great and it looks more expensive than it really is. Looks likely something you'd buy from anthropologie!

评论概述: Nice dress overall but some things to consider!!
评论详情: I ordered this dress 3 times. First in the “Purple” and “Cream” colors - pictures included. The coloring was just wayyyy off from what was shown in the product description pictures. The flowers on the purple dress are bright red. The flowers on the cream dress were a bright green - not at all what I was wanting unfortunately. I returned those two & took a chance and ordered the “Beige” color, thankfully that one actually came in looking like the color pictured! I loved the neutral look of it and wore for my baby shower at 30 weeks pregnant. Size medium fit great. I’m 5’5 & normally 150lb, currently at 180 & it was comfortable and looked great - can’t wait to wear it after pregnancy as well! Another downside was how wrinkled this fabric is. You will definitely want to steam before wearing. Made a huge difference for my dress. Of the 3 I ordered - they were all a bit see through but the “cream” color was by far the most see through! I just wore pregnancy spanx under my dress but would have liked to have a slip ideally. I think it’s a little pricey for what it is (kinda cheaply made, may not hold up super well) but nothing ships faster than an amazon dress and I’m always looking for these things at the last minute, so it was worth it for me!
loved the fabric but the bottice is very small

评论概述: Soo cute ! Buy it !! Nice fit !
评论详情: Love this dress , I am 120 lb bought size M , I worried it may make me look heavy .. but it does NOT ! Great pockets , lots of colors , love puff sleeve up or down , it’s lined so not see thru , great quality ! Very flattering ! Packable , no need to steam or iron ! Just buy it !

I liked how flowy the dress was. However, it felt extremely awkward on my pregnant belly. It fit in the length and tummy area however the arms were a little too big on me but then it was extra tight on my growing chest...... just an awkward fit for me. WAS NOT AS CRAZY ABOUT THE COLOR IN PERSON. Decided to return.
It fit exactly how I hoped it would! I’m between a medium/ large and a medium fit great! I can’t wait to wear it for fall family photos.

评论概述: cute but a little tight around the arms!
评论详情: my new favorite dress!! only thing i don’t like is that it’s a smidge too tight around my arms, but if i break it in it’ll be perfect!
The sleeves were half sleeves instead of long sleeve and it didn’t go all the way to your ankles and it was a way lighter color
This is one of my favorite dresses !! The quality is 10/10 and the sizing is TTS the dress is very Breathable I am going to order it in another color for our pictures coming up !!
The shoulder strap did not have any elastic on one side. I cannot even wear this item.

I do want to like this dress because it’s flattering on. I got a size small and I’m 5’2 and 110 lbs for reference. Fits great. But it’s so sheer you can definitely see your underwear and also I haven’t even washed it yet and it’s coming apart at a seam.
Super cute and flattering. I need to adjust the elastic though because it digs into my forearms aggressively.
Would be perfect for a pregnant momma.  Top stretches to allow for various bust sizes.  Overall, very happy with this one!

The overall fit of the dress is great. I tend to be a true medium but I decided to size up for a more flowy look. I ordered this dress for family pictures and I'm debating on if it's going to look okay or not as the dress colors are overall brighter than pictured. (See video for reference.) I feel like nowadays photographers tend to tone down the colors in pictures and that's the only way I could see this dress working out, but I might have to return unfortunately.
Better than the free people version of this dress!!! Not lined, but not see through. Fabric quality is so good. Sizing is true to size. I am 5’4, 150lbs and a medium fit perfectly.

I was pleasantly surprised with this dress as it’s much nicer than expected and looks like a Free People dupe.  I wore it a bunch over the summer and always got compliments on it.  Definitely recommend for anyone postpartum too!

I love the shape and fit of this dress. The material is surprisingly good, thick enough to not be transparent but not entirely opaque either. Love the heavily smocked bodice. I am a nursing mom so this has been great going into Fall. It has a lovely flow to it but not too much, I love that it has pockets. I will add that I love this dress for an everyday sort of thing. The picture makes it look a tad dressier than it actually styles. It's got a gauze look to it which in my opinion lends to a more casual feel than dressy. I picked the "brown" option, which I admit is growing on me, but it's sort of orange with pink flowers with plum centers.. it's cute but in a mismatched sort of way.

评论概述: So much greater than I expected!!
评论详情: I got a Small, I’m 5’2. I was a little worried about the length and if it would be too much, but I love every bit of it. The fabric is soft and flowy. The length was right down to my ankles which is exactly what I was hoping. I highly recommend this dress to everyone as a comfy staple.
We bought this for our maternity shoot. Currently 32 weeks and bought a medium. Feels and looks great! It makes the pictures pop if that’s what you’re going for!!
Used for my baby shower so cute and comfy !
This dress is flattering, the fabric is soft and the size fits right.

评论概述: The perfect dress for the occasion!
评论详情: I love how flattering this dress is. It’s soft and stretchy too! It was the perfect shade of pink for my gender reveal.

So comfy, chic and perfect for this time of year. I’d purchase this in a million colors if I could but the price point is a little expensive. Overall worth the purchase, very happy with the quality of the fabric, the fit and all else about this dress it’s beautiful!

评论概述: I was so skeptical, but this dress is a steal
评论详情: I read through many reviews and had this dress sitting in my cart for a few weeks before I decided to take a chance on it. After reading so many reviews and looking at the different product photos, there seemed to be 2 different variations of this beige dress- one being with just white skinnier flowers and one with the darker beige and cream.  I was over the moon to receive the beige with the darker and cream flowers. I’m 5 ft and 99 lbs. A size small fits like a glove. It is slightly long and a bit more heavier on the bottom than the top, but so flowy and flattering.  The sleeves are indeed short, but that adds a level of flirt that I love. The dress is great quality for the price, although I’d probably hand wash and air dry to really withstand time and avoid shrinkage. The price and quality seems reasonable, as long as you’re aware this isn’t meant to be a daily wear dress and you’re paying for that handful of special wears with a lot of compliments.  Overall, it’s a very functional dress. I wore it for family photos, my birthday, and will probably wear it again for thanksgiving! Also, shipment arrived exactly when it said it would!

Loved this dress for a fall family photo shoot. My only complaint is that some of the seams were fraying when I got it. I didn't have enough time to exchange it, so I kept it. I'm sure it's not noticeable in photos, but slightly disappointing as it was brand new...

I bought this for my baby shower dress. Got so many compliments! It is very comfortable and I can’t wait to keep wearing it when I am not pregnant! Material is great. I bought my non-pregnant size (S) and it still fit me for pregnancy!
SOOO cute! Lots of compliments. SO worth it!

Unfortunately this dress was way too tight, and I was so sad because it’s gorgeous and I really wanted to wear it for our apple orchard family photos! If it fit I would give 5 stars. Amazon said I would be a large and it was just way too tight on me. I think the large would fit someone 160-180 lbs max

In other dresses I typically wear a medium but this one just didn't fit quite right. I did order a Large so we shall see if that makes the fit better or its just the dress. Otherwise, it is a cute dress, not as great quality as its dupe but still cute for the cheaper price!
awkward fit, immediately returned.

评论概述: Cute but not worth the price point
评论详情: This dress is adorable upon first try-on, and the fit is great. It is not lined, but feels thick enough to hang well and isn't see through. The quality of the embroidery is not good, though. There are holes around many of the small flowers. They aren't huge and I didn't notice them until I was searching since this was in other reviews as a complaint. There are also some small threads hanging from the flowers and seams here and there. If this was a $20 dress I'd say it was great, but at $55 it absolutely is not worth the money for the quality. I worry it will get ruined in the wash even on delicate, or snag one of the small holes super easily and be just a couple-time-wear dress... which should not be the case for the price. Should be closer to $30 for the cheaper quality.

Loved this dress and got a ton of compliments on the color. The flow is super nice. It’s the tiniest bit of an awkward length because it’s not to your ankles but just above. And the sleeves are NOT as long as the picture. It didn’t bother me much but I would have loved a longer sleeve! Great dress. There’s no tag so be aware that the back of the dress has a seam going down the middle of the fabric and the front does not.
Me gustó mucho, está muy bello

I really liked this dress, it’s cute and flattering and true to size. However, I wore it one time and noticed the threading on the midsection area starting to come loose already. After one wear I had to send it back.
Very thin, some threads were already loose when I received the dress
Cute dress, nice quality but they sent the wrong size.
I would never pay anything more than $10 for something made like this.
I love these dresses so much, however I notice the seems separating on them. I own three & am having to mend all three of them

This dress is amazing. I ordered another color from another seller and it was so poorly made. This one was much better quality. It is a bit small on me even tho I ordered the recommended size. Wish I could exchange super quick because I bought it for a photo shoot but I know it wouldn’t come fast enough. It really is a pretty dress

Great quality, I was worried that the dress would be too small because I normally wear an XL but there was only Larges left for the biggest size. It fits great! I love that it is double lined, has pockets, and it’s flattering on a pear shaped body!

Dress is very cute and the color is amazing. It's stretchy but I couldn't wear a bra or else it would be too tight. I'm bigger up top. The flow was nice, wear sheer underwear though! Overall, highly recommend!
I purchased the brown with black flowers and it’s definitely more of a maroon with purple flowers. Fit is good.
It’s pretty but see through. The stitching came apart in several places after 3 months and minimal use.
The dress is beautiful and fits soo nice its looks like the free people dress!! I absolutely love it!!

Color is different from stock photo. “Rose” is more of a hot pink and “pink” is more bubblegum. It’s not as stretchy across the bust as I would like. Fits well for maternity dress. Light and airy. 35 weeks pregnant. 5’2

Cheap fabric and poked a hole through it with my fingers during the first wear. My nails are not long and ive never worn acrylics. Comparable to cheese cloth material. Otherwise looks like the picture

Really loved this dress! I bought it because it seems so versatile and can be dressed up or down. I never tried the free people dress, but I thought the quality of this dress was great especially for the price. I’m a size XL/16 in dresses and the Large fit great. I will say that the color is nothing like what I pictured. It was more of a reddish brown and the flowers are a burgundy/purple. I still liked it, but just know the color may not be what you expect.

I bought this dress for maternity photos and it was beautiful. After wearing it for less then an hour for photos, I went to wear it again and there is a big hole in the skirt of the dress where the stitching is coming undone. Poor quality.
So cute, the fit was perfect.

评论概述: Pictures posted are literally from free people website
评论详情: Super disappointed! Fly away strings all over, inaccurate colors in the dress and also the sewed on flowers. They’re more muted in the photos because those pictures come from free people website. Scam!! I knew it was a dupe but didn’t realize how BAD it would be. Horrible quality, comes vacuum packed and smells like cheese feet.

Love this dress. Would order it in every color if it was cheaper. The fit is great. The material is a bit on the cheaper side but I don’t mind. Cute. The length is perfect for me (5’4”) and I got it in a medium.

评论概述: Cute but not the same quality as Free People
评论详情: I was really hoping that this was going to be a really good quality dress but unfortunately there were a little strings that were hanging off of it when I purchased it. Ultimately, I returned it, but I think if I was going to have a dress, that looked just like the free people dress than I would’ve liked it!

I absolutely love this dress and get so many compliments when I wear it but the sizing is off. I am typically a small or medium and decided to purchase a medium after reading multiple reviews but I ended up returning and ordering a large which was much more comfortable. Overall sizing runs small on this dress but highly recommend if you find your perfect size! Great free people dupe

The quality is absolutely there in my opinion. Soft fabric, not see through in sky blue and flower embroidery is well sewn. A little steaming needed from packaging/wrinkling and it’s golden! I’m 5’4, 150lbs, 34DD, 28 waist and a size small is perfect! Highly recommend, great free people dupe!
Pretty but definitely not long sleeves.
I got the hot pink color for a baby shower and it’s perfect. Such a beautiful color. Pockets, and so flattering on
Really like this dress. I would have given 5 stars but felt like it's a little over priced.
This is very see through and the material feels cheap. It’s a snug fit on the top as well! The skirt is a good fit though.
The floral stitching is not a brown color. It is maroon not as pictured, very disappointing.

评论概述: Not as pictured and super thin
评论详情: The main photo of this is the free people photo. I have the free people dress and ordered this since the free people one does not fit me. This is super thin and not as pictured. The left dress is the free people dress and the right one is this dress. I ordered the large and fits the same as my small free people dress. Free people runs large, this runs small.
By far my favorite dress I’ve gotten on Amazon, might have to re-sew a couple seams but super versatile and great quality!!
I loved this dress for my last trimester of pregnancy, so comfy and flattering! Kept me cool during summer pregnancy as well because it is flowy and light. Bonus pockets.
Design had a few thread flaws, but nothing crazy. Overall cute. I would order a size up for comfort of the tight chest section.
Literally the cutest dupe from FP. I love it so much and it’s so comfortable. True to size. Don’t hesitate to purchase
This dress was better than I expected. Perfect fit, very comfortable and has pockets. It’s just like the FP one!
Dress came in a vacuum sealed package however, when i opened it, it was slightly damp and smelled moldy... :( cute dress though and very flattering

Minus a few minor stitching details this dress is a perfect dupe for the Dahlia dress from Free People. Sheer colors may need a slip or nude underwear. Got so many compliments and it was very flattering.
Today I wore it for the first time and I find this gaping hole. And the stitches in another parts are coming apart too. Since I have worn it, I can’t return it. Do not recommend anyone to buy it.

评论概述: Came damp inside the airtight package
评论详情: Unfortunately when I opened the airtight package it was damp and the dress smelled like mildew. It’s a beautiful dress, I am going to wash it and hopefully the smell goes away :(
Not great quality for the price. Fit is not like it shows in the picture. And it runs much smaller than it seems.
